zone
****


Description
===========

A DNS zone.

**Warning:** Oracle recommends that you avoid using any confidential
information when you supply string values using the API.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* create-zone-from-zone-file

* delete

* get

* get-zone-content

* list

* migrate-from-dynect

* promote-zone-dnssec-key-version

* stage-zone-dnssec-key-version

* update
